category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 6 (Compliance with Safety and Health Management Regulations)
contents: Article 6 (Compliance with safety and health management regulations) The chairman of the board of directors must maintain and promote the safety and health of workers by carrying out the following matters. Revised on December 22, 2021, 1. Compliance with the industrial accident prevention standards set forth in this regulation, 2. Providing workers with information on the Corporationâ€™s safety and health, 3. Creating an appropriate working environment by improving working conditions.
